dct_description_sm: Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
Bar scale on map given in "English Miles."
Shows topography, drainage, boundaries, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Includes legend: Note of the colouring.
3 inset maps: The jouneyings of Christ -- Environs of Jerusalem -- Sketch showing the divisions into tribes.
Appears in Bartholomew's Philip's handy general atlas of the world, 1874.
